summary: SPECIALTIES: Master Leader conference calls. Business Coaching, Courses, Consulting Problems in Workplace,etc. Communication, Corporate Consulting, Negotiation, Team Building & Language Mastery. Helping people eliminate fears/Phobias to live joyfully.Currently doing MASTER LEADER conference calls with many resources for people who want skills, knowledge and access to Dave Dobson and my many years of experience and don't have time to attend a live course. For busy people! No experience necessary.Master Trainer Excellence Quest Training International, Consultant at JustBeWell.comCo-developer & Consultant HypnosisandNLPUSA.com,Self Growth.com Official Guide to Brain Enhancement, Anti-Aging ExpertPublished Co-Author author of Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Energy but Were too Tired to Ask, Co-Author of the Master Trainer's Book, publisher of Pain Alleviation.Practicing Hypnosis for over 45 years.Working with the Society of NLP & Dr. Richard Bandler, co-creator of NLP, for 30 years, on his support training team for 25. Trained & apprenticed with Dr. David Dobson, father of Other Than Conscious Communication™ and No Fault Psychology™,  life/professional partner, Heir to his work and teaching it. Ordained as Minister in 1965. Trainer with Tony Robbins for over 8 years.Online store with many personal development products. http://excelquest.com/store/, EXCLUSIVE HOME of  DAVE DOBSON, PHD courses, audio & Video!
